How to Use Your Uploaded Sounds

• Upload high-quality audio files (MP3, WAV recommended)

• Sounds will automatically appear in the sungazing timer

• Users can select different sounds based on their preference

• Consider uploading: Nature sounds, ambient music, singing bowls, frequencies
